title: Google Pixel 4 Review: The Smartest Smartphone You Probably Won’t Buy
text:
This is nuts. I’m speaking very fast right now. Not like auctioneer fast but fast. Yet the Google Pixel is transcribing all my words as I say them. Whoa it just inserted all the proper punctuation without me having to say it oh whoops it missed a comma and a period. Whatever. I forgive you and still love you Pixel. Even though your battery life should be better.

Google’s Pixel 4 transcribed that whole thing. In fact, it transcribed much of this entire column. Why won’t I shut up about a voice-recorder app? Because, well,...
description: The Pixel 4, with improved camera, incredibly accurate text-to-speech and an actually useful voice assistant, is a super smart smartphone; too bad most people won’t buy it.
